title: Rumbleverse is the fresh take on battle royale I needed
description: Bombastic wrestling moves and fighting game mechanics make for exciting close-quarters brawls.

title: Rocksmith+, Ubisoft's learn-to-play-guitar game, finally rocks out next week
description: The subscription-based guitar game launches on September 6, a year after its 2021 delay.

title: One of the best city builders around is getting a hefty update
description: Medieval city builder Foundation's 1.9 update has new and interesting ways to manage your cities.

title: Our highest-reviewed game of 2022 so far is immediately on Game Pass
description: And free with your Netflix subscription, too.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage will be revealed in September, according to a new leak
description: The leak says the game currently code-named Rift will see the return of Basim Ibn Ishaq.

title: Leaked images finally show us Logitech's new handheld gaming console
description: The Logitech G Gaming handheld looks a little familiar.
